segments.text: Then I'll have to borrow it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure you can . But I'm only gonna keep it for a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's why I can profit from it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're going to re-sell it on eBay Taiwan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You bet . eBay Taiwan doesn't have it ! And bidding will start at two thousand NT . This baby's worth about six thousand to real tennis fans ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've created a monster ... you're a better bayer than me !
segments.speaker: S1
